description: Run. Relax. Repeat. That’s the M.O. of the Escalante 2.5: ready to go when you are, ready to chill when you are. It fits comfortably into your schedule and comfortably on your feet. The sock-like upper brings you both performance and all-day comfort with added perforations for increased breathability. It’s comfy, it’s casual and it’s versatile. If you’re up for it, so is the Escalante 2.5.
name: Altra Escalante 2.5 - Mens
